Title: VHome
Description: A Cloud-Based Consumer-Centric System for Energy Data Analytics while ensuring consumer data privacy, data ownerhsip and control.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Cloud-Based Consumer-Centric System for Energy Data Analytics while ensuring consumer data privacy, data ownerhsip and control.


This is a prototype implementation of a Personal Execution and Data Environment (called VHome)
suitable for individuals to host and process smart meter data or other forms of energy data.
